topic.title: Katalon TestCloud Definitions
topic.shortdesc: Name the ID in the following format: <product name>-<definition name>-definition. For example: ks-test-iteration-definition

body.p: A tunnel is used to secure the movement of data from one network to another.

section.title: Tunnel
section.p: A tunnel is used to secure the movement of data from one network to another.

section.title: TestCloud Tunnel
section.p: TestCloud Tunnel enables a secure connection to local resources so that users can test their software/application in a restricted environment, avoiding unwanted external access from the global network.
